response.summary: As a Mechatronics Engineer with a strong interest in software technologies, particularly in the fields of robotics, computer vision, and machine learning, I am currently working as a software developer with a focus on React.js and Python solutions. My experience includes API-driven development, CI/CD pipelines, unit/integration testing, and working with C++ and databases. I thrive in multifaceted and multicultural teams and am always eager to learn from others. I have also had the opportunity to participate in a research project where I applied reinforcement learning algorithms to solve complex continuous control problems in robotics applications.
response.skills: Sistema Operativo Robótico (ROS), C++, Inglés, React.js, Aprendizaje por refuerzo, JavaScript, Python
